attributes.action: Re-think how banning replica weapons are going to lower gun crime.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All over the news there are members of the government slating how gun crime is assisted by the sale of replica, especially blank firing weapons, even though they are not easy to convert to fire live ammunintion very easily at all as the materials they are made of cannot stand the forces of live ammunition.
I can see that many collectors of these types of weapons, including me, are going to be asked to hand them over and i dont think that is right!
Please sign this petition if you agree.
